title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog Details
description:
When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, the following issues are observed:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.

To resolve these issues, the following changes are suggested:
i. Perform duplicated name validation on the first page of the dialog.
ii. Merge the first and second columns.
OB:
a. Buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. Dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
